segments.text: Confronted with difficult questions in an interview , the job-hunters mostly will be at a loss about what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually , you cannot prepare for these questions in advance and have to depend on your immediate performance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Still , there are some rules to follow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In this case , you should first keep calm and normal to the face .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't get nervous and freaked out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Formulate a satisfactory answer based on your specific situation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There should be neither too much silence nor hasty answers
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Try to show the best of yourself with decent words and manners .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be discouraged even when confronted with negative questions
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should admit your weakness frankly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyway , what really matters is that you have tried your best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must have confidence in yourself .
segments.speaker: S2
